comment:
* The set of parameters that has to be attached to each view contained in
     * the view group animated by the grid layout animation controller. These
     * parameters are used to compute the start time of each individual view's
     * animation.

variables.name: column
variables.comment: * The view group's column to which the view belongs.

variables.name: row
variables.comment: * The view group's row to which the view belongs.

variables.name: columnsCount
variables.comment: * The number of columns in the view's enclosing grid layout.

variables.name: rowsCount
variables.comment: * The number of rows in the view's enclosing grid layout.
